mapper.select: select g.gameid, g.gamename, g.chance, c.cpname from gameinfo g ,cp_game cg, cpinfo c where g.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = c.cpid and g.gameid = #{gameId}

select count(g.gameid) from gameinfo g ,cp_game cg, cpinfo c where g.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = c.cpid and g.gameid like concat('%', #{gameId}, '%') and g.gamename like concat('%', #{gameName}, '%') and c.cpname like concat('%', #{cpName}, '%')

select g.gameid, g.gamename, g.chance, c.cpname, date_format(g.modifytime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifytime from gameinfo g ,cp_game cg, cpinfo c where g.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = c.cpid and g.gameid like concat('%', #{gameId}, '%') and g.gamename like concat('%', #{gameName}, '%') and c.cpname like concat('%', #{cpName}, '%') order by g.modifytime desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into gameinfo (gameid, gamename, chance) values (#{gameId}, #{gameName}, #{chance})
mapper.update: update gameinfo set gamename = #{gameName}, chance = #{chance} where gameid = #{gameId}
